content: attach yarn to 21st st from right side edge of tote chain 75 attach to 41st st from right side edge of tote fasten_off and secure yarn tails repeat on other side of tote finishing felting instructions set washing machine to low water level hot water heavy duty agitation and add a drop or two of mild liquid soap such as ivory liquid place crocheted bag in washer along with old denim jeans to increase agitation let the machine agitate the bag for about 10 minutes then check to see how bag is felting do not let the water drain out or go to rinse cycle but continue to check every 5 minutes until bag has reached desired amount of felting keep resetting machine to agitation cycle if necessary when bag is desired size remove from washer and rinse thoroughly in lukewarm water in sink press between dry towels to remove as much water as possible then lay flat on more dry towels and leave to dry completely copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
